A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: the movie butchered Luke's character making him a weening old man\, and had an almost 45min sequence the Canto Bright ''adventure'' which felt like it was brought straight out of the prequels\nthere was no development for the over all story or the characters during that side story- adventure which felt super unnecessary and boring\nfinally the cuts and transitions from scene to scene where very poorly written  and constructed
